title: Costa Concordia's Rusty Hulk Embarks On A Final Voyage
teaser: More than two years since it ran aground off an Italian island and killed 32 people, the Costa Concordia cruise ship is finally up and away. Cocooned in stabilizing containers that act as floats, the crippled ship is headed to Genoa, where it will be broken up for scrap.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
